name: AEKeyDesc
desc: Associates a keyword with a descriptor to form a keyword-specifieddescriptor.

items.name: var descContent: AEDesc
items.desc: A descriptor of type AEDesc that stores the keyword descriptordata. See AEDesc.

items.name: var descKey: AEKeyword
items.desc: A four-character code of type AEKeyword that uniquely identifies thekey that is associated with the data in the structure. Some keywordconstants are described in Keyword Attribute Constants and Keyword Parameter Constants.See AEKeyword.
